item.title: 资金短缺的芝加哥学校从信贷额度中提取 2 亿美元
item.description: 芝加哥教育委员会从与 PNC 银行签订的短期循环信贷协议中动用了 2 亿美元。【原文：The Chicago Board of Education tapped $200 million from its short-term revolving credit agreement with PNC Bank.】

item.title: 兰特不再 "脆弱和动荡"，南非的卡冈亚戈说
item.description: 南非储备银行行长莱塞特贾-克加亚戈（Lesetja Kganyago）说："兰特因其近期的稳定性而值得更多的尊重，如果它 "变得强势得令人不安，我们将乐于积累更多的储备"。【原文：The rand deserves more respect for its recent stability and if it “gets uncomfortably strong, we would be happy to accumulate more reserves,” said South African Reserve Bank Governor Lesetja Kganyago.】

item.title: Ambipar 首席执行官失去部分股权，前首席财务官对指控提出异议
item.description: Ambipar Participações e Empreendimentos SA 公司继续走下坡路，因为这家废物管理公司的控股股东失去了部分股权，而且一名前高管在法庭上对债务危机应归咎于他的行为提出异议。【原文：Ambipar Participações e Empreendimentos SA continued its downward spiral as the waste management firm’s controlling shareholder lost part of his stake and a former top executive disputed in court that his actions are to blame for a debt crisis.】

item.title: 美联储主席穆萨勒姆表示，如果劳动力市场疲软，他对进一步缩减开支持开放态度
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆说，他支持上个月的降息，认为这是为劳动力市场疲软投保的一种方式，但他重申官员们需要继续防范通胀升高。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President Alberto Musalem said he supported last month’s interest-rate reduction as a way to take out insurance against the weakening labor market, but reiterated officials need to continue leaning against elevated inflation.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁令股市沸腾 公牛对贸易战 "沾沾自喜
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战远未结束。【原文：President Donald Trump’s trade war is far from over.】

item.title: MJH 生命科学公司以大幅折扣价获得 4.3 亿美元贷款
item.description: 在投资者对一些高风险债务交易持谨慎态度的背景下，一笔 4.3 亿美元的杠杆贷款以 2025 年最大幅度的折扣定价，为 MJH 生命科学公司的收购提供资金。【原文：A $430 million leveraged loan to help fund an acquisition by MJH Life Sciences was priced at one of the steepest discounts of 2025 amid investor wariness about some risky debt deals.】

item.title: 米娜的追随者》为何推迟上映
item.description: 游艇俱乐部游戏公司尚未给出新的发布日期，但延迟时间应该不会超过几个月。【原文：Yacht Club Games hasn't given a new release date, but the delay shouldn’t be more than a few months】

item.title: 部长表示，加拿大将谨慎审查特朗普的矿产交易
item.description: 加拿大工业部长梅拉妮-乔利（Melanie Joly）表示，在特朗普政府推行民族主义经济政策之际，加拿大需要 "逐案 "评估美国政府对该国重要矿产公司的投资。【原文：Canada needs to assess US government investments in the country’s critical minerals companies on a “case-by-case basis” at a time when the Trump administration is pursuing a nationalist economic policy, Industry Minister Melanie Joly said.】

item.title: 花旗集团将加入开发欧元稳定币的银行联盟
item.description: 花旗集团正在加入由九家欧洲贷款机构组成的开发受监管的基于欧元的稳定币的团队，这是大型金融机构进入快速增长的数字货币领域的最新举措。【原文：Citigroup Inc. is joining a group of nine European lenders developing a regulated euro-based stablecoin, the latest move by a large financial institution into the fast-growing area of digital money.】

item.title: Equinor 将启动巴西沿海被推迟的石油项目
item.description: Equinor ASA 公司称，在巴西海岸的一个大型深水油田不久将开始生产，此前该项目曾遭遇延误，而该项目对其增长战略至关重要。【原文：Equinor ASA says it could soon start producing at a large deep-water oil field off the coast of Brazil after suffering delays at a project that’s crucial for its growth strategy.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁对中国征收大规模新关税，铜价暴跌
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要 "大规模增加 "对中国商品征收的关税，这一言论引发了整个金融市场的动荡，铜价创下五个月来最大跌幅。【原文：Copper slumped by the most in five months after President Donald Trump threatened a “massive increase” of tariffs on Chinese goods, in comments that sparked turmoil across financial markets.】

item.title: 据说代币化公司 Securitize 正在与 Cantor SPAC 谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，将投资代币化的区块链公司 Securitize 正在商谈通过 Cantor Fitzgerald LP 创办的空白支票公司上市事宜。【原文：Securitize, a blockchain firm that tokenizes investments, is in talks to go public via a blank-check company started by Cantor Fitzgerald LP, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁对中国征收新关税，伦敦铜价暴跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要对来自中国的商品 "大规模增加 "关税之后，伦敦金属交易所的铜价最高下跌了 3.4%。【原文：Copper fell as much as 3.4% on the London Metal Exchange after US President Donald Trump threatened a “massive increase” of tariffs on goods from China.】

item.title: 尽管停摆，美国统计局仍将于 10 月 24 日发布 9 月份 CPI 报告
item.description: 美国劳工统计局（Bureau of Labor Statistics）表示，将于 10 月 24 日公布 9 月份的消费者价格指数，这是在政府停摆期间发布数据的罕见例外。【原文：The Bureau of Labor Statistics said it will publish the September consumer price index on Oct. 24, marking a rare exception to release data during the government shutdown.】

item.title: 贵金属公司首席执行官称黄金将突破 5000 美元
item.description: 惠顿贵金属公司（Wheaton Precious Metals Corp.【原文：Gold could climb to $5,000 an ounce within a year and double that by the end of the decade, according to the head of Wheaton Precious Metals Corp.】

item.title: 中东市场上涨令交易员警惕追逐更多收益
item.description: 随着加沙停火协议取得进展，以色列和埃及股市创下历史新高，并推动沙特阿拉伯股市反弹，中东市场本周出现反弹。【原文：Markets rallied around the Middle East this week with progress on a Gaza ceasefire deal sending Israeli and Egyptian stocks to record highs and boosting a rebound in Saudi Arabia.】

item.title: 安杜里尔首席执行官预测与中国的地缘政治冲突将旷日持久
item.description: 安杜里工业公司（Anduril Industries Inc.首席执行官布莱恩-辛普夫（Brian Schimpf）周五表示，就在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发出新的关税威胁后不久，市场出现了大幅波动。【原文：Geopolitical tensions with China are part of the new reality for American companies, Anduril Industries Inc. Chief Executive Officer Brian Schimpf said on Friday, shortly after new tariff threats by US President Donald Trump sent the markets skittering.】

item.title: 德国化学品制造商称碳成本损害欧洲优势
item.description: 德国化工企业表示，高昂的碳排放配额成本正在损害欧洲的竞争力，各行业纷纷要求放宽气候措施，以帮助陷入困境的行业。【原文：German chemical companies said high costs for carbon allowances are damaging Europe’s competitiveness, adding to a cacophony of sectors pushing for climate measures to be eased to help ailing industries.】

item.title: 房地产公司 GTC 就出售部分德国投资组合进行谈判
item.description: 波兰房地产开发商 Globe Trade Centre SA 正在洽谈出售其不到一年前购买的德国住宅投资组合的一部分。【原文：Polish real estate developer Globe Trade Centre SA is in talks to sell part of a German residential portfolio it bought less than a year ago.】

item.title: 诺和诺德停止细胞疗法治疗糖尿病的工作以降低成本
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）裁减了其细胞治疗部门，该部门一直在努力寻找治疗 1 型糖尿病的方法，这家 Ozempic 生产商也在继续裁员，以专注于利润丰厚的肥胖症和糖尿病治疗领域。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S cut its cell therapy division, which has been trying to find a cure for type 1 diabetes, as the Ozempic maker continues to slash headcount to focus on lucrative areas of obesity and diabetes treatment.】

item.title: Fortress 联席首席执行官意外逝世，530 亿美元债务公司受到冲击
item.description: 早在成为联合首席执行官之前，德鲁-麦克奈特和乔希-帕克就因在堡垒投资集团（Fortress Investment Group）内的紧密合作关系而闻名。【原文：Well before they became co-chief executive officers, Drew McKnight and Josh Pack were known for their close partnership within Fortress Investment Group.】

item.title: 橡树树支持的大宗商品交易商正在洽谈出售少数股权事宜
item.description: 橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management LP）正在洽谈出售 Hartree Partners LP 的少数股权。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management LP is in talks to sell a minority stake in Hartree Partners LP, the commodity house it first invested in a decade ago and has since helped grow into a global trading powerhouse.】

item.title: 特朗普认为 "没有理由 "与习近平会晤，威胁征收新关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他认为 "没有理由 "与中国国家主席习近平会面，并以最近对稀土矿物的 "敌对 "出口管制为由，威胁要对来自中国的商品 "大规模增加 "关税。【原文：US President Donald Trump said he saw “no reason” to meet Chinese President Xi Jinping and threatened a “massive increase” of tariffs on goods from China, citing recent “hostile” export controls on rare-earth minerals.】

item.title: 我对预测市场最大的疑问
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: Venture Global 认沽期权买家因股价下跌获利近 200 万美元
item.description: 上周买入大量 Venture Global Inc. 看跌期权的一位投资者，在周五早盘股价暴跌后获得了近 200 万美元的纸面利润。【原文：An investor who bought a large number of Venture Global Inc. put options last week is sitting on a paper profit of almost $2 million after shares plunged early Friday.】

item.title: 中美贸易问题挥之不去，大豆期货跌幅扩大
item.description: 周五，大豆期货连续第二个交易日扩大跌幅，原因是中国宣布对停靠其港口的美国船只征收特别费用，这一针锋相对的措施表明双方之间的贸易紧张局势可能会持续下去。【原文：Soybean futures extended losses for a second session on Friday as China announced special fees on US ships docking at its ports, a tit-for-tat measure signaling that trade tensions between the two sides are likely to persist.】

item.title: 高盛和桑坦德银行是探索区块链货币的银行之一
item.description: 包括高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.）、德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）、美国银行（Bank of America Corp）和桑坦德银行（Banco Santander）在内的一批国际银行已联手探索在公共区块链上发行 "数字货币"，这标志着大型金融机构在研究加密货币支付技术的可能用途方面取得了最新进展。【原文：A group of international banks including Goldman Sachs Group Inc., Deutsche Bank AG, Bank of America Corp. and Banco Santander, have joined forces to explore the issuance of “digital money” on public blockchains, marking the latest push by large financial institutions to examine possible uses for the technology underpinning cryptocurrencies for payments.】

item.title: 债务投资者对受人工智能冲击的公司越来越警惕
item.description: 债务投资者越来越担心那些有可能因人工智能而被淘汰的公司，这使得一些公司更难筹集到资金。【原文：Debt investors are growing more concerned about companies that are at risk of becoming obsolete because of artificial intelligence, making it harder for some corporations to raise money.】

item.title: 化肥厂问题加重关税不利因素，马赛克公司业绩下滑
item.description: 化肥公司 Mosaic Co. 的股价下跌，原因是磷酸盐工厂的运营问题影响了生产，给本已受到美国关税影响的化肥行业增加了压力。【原文：Shares of fertilizer company Mosaic Co. dropped as operational issues at phosphate plants hit production, adding pressure to a segment already suffering from US tariffs.】

item.title: 调查显示，企业为人工智能支付过高费用增加了泡沫风险
item.description: 最新的《市场脉搏》（Markets Pulse）调查显示，越来越多的人怀疑企业在人工智能方面是否物有所值。这让人们更加担心，16 万亿美元从熊市边缘反弹的势头已接近爆发点。【原文：There’s growing doubt that firms are getting what they pay for when it comes to artificial intelligence, the latest Markets Pulse survey showed. That’s adding to concerns the $16 trillion rally from the brink of a bear market is nearing its breaking point.】
